text: Ezɨ Enok uaghan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Ezɨ bizir kam bagha God a inigha uan Nguibamɨn ghuavanabozɨ an aremezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazamiziba a buria, an apizir Puvatɨ, God a inigha ghuavanabo. Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, God tɨghar Enok iniamin dughiamɨn, an araziba bar Godɨn damazimɨn derazɨ an a bagha bar akonge.
